attrib: +10 Strength</br>10 Intelligence</br>+75% Mana Regeneration</br>+15 Attack Damage</br>+10 Attack Speed</br>
desc: Causes melee attacks to attack twice in quick succession. The double attacks apply a 0.6 second 100% movement and attack speed slow on each strike.
lore: A deceptively swift blade imbued with resonant magic.
